review: Oh my... What clarity!  My Amazon Fire TV stick was super easy to assemble that within 2 1/2 mins of setting it up (including watching the informative guide),  I was enjoying HD quality TV.  I can truly say,  the picture quality is as good or better then cable TV!  And I didn't even have to get stuck paying a high monthly cable bill or a lengthy contact!  I am ALL smiles,  thank you  Amazon for such a wonderful site!  Most of my shopping is through Amazon and your Prime membership pays for itself.

review: The Fire TV Stick is pretty simple to set up.  Make sure you have an HDMI port on your TV and an electrical outlet nearby to connect the Stick to.  The remote is extrely simple just like the Apple TV remote, they are not interchangeable.  I would recommend the upgraded remote that uses voice commands, life gets much simpler.
